==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|sort=たばこ}}
From {{etyl|pt|ja|sort=たばこ}} ''[[tabaco]]''. The kanji do not regard with the reading at all, so the reading is [[jukujikun]].

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|莨}}
* {{l|ja|多葉粉}}
* {{l|ja|丹波粉}}
* {{l|ja|淡婆姑}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|たばこ|タバコ}}

# [[tobacco]], [[cigar]], [[cigarette]]

=====Synonyms=====
* {{l|ja|思い草}} (omoigusa)
* {{l|ja|忘れ草}} (wasuregusa)

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|えん|そう|yomi=o}}
/en'sau/ > /en'soː/. The [[w:On'yomi|on'yomi]] reading of the kanji 煙草.

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|えんそう|hhira=えんさう}}

# [[tobacco]], [[cigar]], [[cigarette]]

[[Category:ja:Tobacco]]
